title: How to painlessly remove a splinter - Quora

response.answer_text: I've tried a few things. Eggshells. Bread. A banana peel. Tape.What worked? Baking soda mixed into a paste and spread over the sliver. Put on bandaid. Let dry. It actually pulled it to the surface where I could pull it out with tape or tweezers. I was shocked because nothing else worked. It does cause your skin to dry and peel a little as well.
